system.description:
At 15th level, your self-sufficiency and sheer toughness can help you get out of the toughest jams. Once per long rest as a bonus action, you can renew yourself. When you do, you gain the following benefits:

  • You regain exertion points equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1).
  • You heal hit points equal to  1d10 + your ranger level. 
  • You may attempt to recover a level of fatigue or strife. Roll a d20. If the result is 17 or greater, you remove a single level of fatigue or strife (your choice).

! Foundry note, action consumers current set to -1 (regain 1 use), change this to the wisdom modifier since modifier mods aren't allowed at time of creation.
